name: Anmynor Puzzles
description: Anmynor Puzzles is set in a world of magic where challenges await in the 100 levels that make up this adventure. Use and combine the abilities of 17 unique and charming characters, the Golems on a journey to gather all the Elemental Runes. Anmynor Puzzles is set in a world of magic and adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 x32 or x64, Microsoft Vista x32 or x64, Microsoft Windows XP Service Pack 3 or later Processor: 2 GHz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c or later graphics card, with 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 2 button mouse

reviews.review_text: It's terribly funny!! For me it has been a complete surprise, because I didn't know nothing about this game. It has some problems with the audio, but the music is funny too. There are level that are very very devilishly.
